body:
Well, this is a popular forum game among many communities. I decided to bring it here.

For those of you who aren't familiar, here is how it goes.

One person will start by naming their wish, such as; "I wish for crispy bacon and eggs."

The person below that person will corrupt their wish by saying something like; "You get that wish, but the bacon is soggy and the eggs are as hard as bullets."

And it goes on. I'll start.

I wish for my internet to be faster.

title: [Forum Game] Corrupt a Wish

replies.body:
You get that wish, but you still have Australian ping in Avicus. :)

I wish for Chatbot to love me.
